short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove annoying clutter, improve search, & bring back features of the web. Works on Twitter, YouTube, & Major Search Engines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our mission is to give users granular control over what they see and experience on the desktop web.

Use simple toggle switches to; reduce advertising footprints/volume, add or remove features on social media websites, remove clutter sites try to shove at you, improve your search experience by removing specific sites or sections from search results, and give yourself built-in tools and utilities without needing more extensions. 

Ultimasaurus currently works on Google, X, YouTube, Facebook, Bing, DuckDuckGo, Wikipedia, and numerous Shopify stores. 

Google Controls
ðŸ‘‰ Turn Off Google's AI Overviews.
ðŸ‘‰ Remove People Also Ask, From Sources Across the Web, and Discussion & Forums sections.
ðŸ‘‰ Remove Sitelinks from ads on Google to make the ad take up less space.
ðŸ‘‰ Cut Out Amazon, Reddit, Quora, Stackoverflow/Stackechange, or IMDB from your search results.
ðŸ‘‰ Add Expert Insights on specific keyword searches. See more about this feature here: https://ultimasaurus.com/features/expert-insights/

X / Twitter Controls
ðŸ‘‰ Remove the "Explore"/"What's Happening", "Who to Follow", and "Subscribe to Premium" sections.

Facebook Controls
ðŸ‘‰ Remove Facebook's Stories section.

YouTube Controls
ðŸ‘‰ Show a dislike count on YouTube videos.
ðŸ‘‰ Block YouTube's premium upgrade popup.

Wikipedia Controls
ðŸ‘‰ Block donation popups (experimental, may miss some)

Shopify Controls
ðŸ‘‰ Automatically Apply Coupons on Shopify Stores.

Bing Controls
ðŸ‘‰ Remove Sitelinks from ads on Bing to make the ad take up less space.
ðŸ‘‰ Cut Out Amazon, Reddit, Quora, Stackoverflow/Stackechange, or IMDB from your search results.
ðŸ‘‰ Cut Out Pinterest images from image search.

DuckDuckGo Controls
ðŸ‘‰ Remove Sitelinks from ads on DuckDuckGo to make the ad take up less space.
ðŸ‘‰ Cut Out Amazon, Reddit, Quora, Stackoverflow/Stackechange, or IMDB from your search results.
ðŸ‘‰ Cut Out Pinterest images from image search.

Utilities / Tools Built-in
ðŸ‘‰ Take simple screenshots.
ðŸ‘‰ Remove logos of big tech websites
ðŸ‘‰ Terminate spam websites from across the web
 
Ultimasaurus is your solution for reducing clutter and distractions while you use the desktop web. It's a perfect solution for freelancers, office workers, people with slower computers or web connections, or even casual web users who want to add features to the web they can use or remove distractions.

The internet belongs to you. Make it your own.

More features coming soon.
